sentences.en: All these, with emancipate the mind to be inseparable.
sentences.cn: 所有这一切, 都与解放思想密不可分.

sentences.en: And fundamentally, is to emancipate the mind, the liberation of productive forces.
sentences.cn: 而从根本上说, 就是解放思想 、 解放生产力.

sentences.en: At that time, because they dare to emancipate the mind, is very valuable.
sentences.cn: 因为当时他们敢于解放思想, 也是非常难能可贵的.

sentences.en: Break down fetishes and superstitions and emancipate the mind.
How to emancipate the mind, the scientific progress three aspects to make the explanation.
sentences.cn: 怎样解放思想 、 科学发展三个方面作了讲解.

sentences.en: Not only should proletarians emancipate themselves but also the whole mankind.
sentences.cn: 无产者不只要解放他们自己,而且要解放全人类.

sentences.en: This new machine will emancipate us from all the hard work.
sentences.cn: 这台新机器将使我们从繁重的劳作中解脱出来.

sentences.en: This new machine will emancipate us from the hard work.
sentences.cn: 这部新机器将把我们从繁重劳动中解放出来.

sentences.en: To emancipate all mankind, we will balk at no sacrifice . even that of our lives.
sentences.cn: 为了全人类的解放, 即使牺牲生命也在所不惜.

sentences.en: To seek truth from facts, we must emancipate our minds.
sentences.cn: 要做到实事求是, 必须解放思想.

sentences.en: We had to arouse them to carry out land reform and emancipate themselves.
sentences.cn: 要把他们发动起来,搞土改闹翻身.

sentences.en: We must emancipate our thinking in a bold way.
sentences.cn: 我们必须大胆解放思想.

sentences.en: We must overcome superstitions and emancipate the mind.
sentences.cn: 我们必须破除迷信,解放思想.

sentences.en: We should do away with all superstitions and emancipate the mind.
sentences.cn: 当前我们应努力克服个人主义和享乐主义各种错误思想.

sentences.en: Women have been struggling to emancipate from old restrictions of various kinds.
sentences.cn: 妇女们一直在为摆脱各种旧束缚而斗争.

words.tran_cn: 解放主义者；解放论的人
解放；使…获得自由（emancipate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to give someone the political or legal rights that they did not have before
to give someone the political or legal rights that they did not have before
